Instruction: Cook quinoa according to package directions.
Cut sweet potato, broccoli, and cauliflower into bite-sized pieces.
Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, pepper, cumin, and paprika.
Spread vegetables on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes, or until tender.
Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
Combine tahini, lemon juice, water, and minced garlic in a small bowl to make the dressing.
Assemble buddha bowls by layering quinoa, roasted vegetables, tofu, avocado, and edamame.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and enjoy.
